title.rendered: Eldorado Natural Stone listed as a top trend in remodeling by Qualified Remodeler

content.rendered:
Eldorado Natural Stone is featured in the February issue of Qualified Remodeler with the 246Ledge profile under the special section titled, “Home Improvement Pro.” The article displays an  image of the 246Ledge Weathered Ore profile along with a description of the new quarried stone profiles. The publication’s editorial focuses on the latest developments in remodeling and the article discusses 246Ledge, ChiselCut, CutLedge and Ledgestone. The feature can be found on page 43.

See more details on the Eldorado Natural Stone Collection here.
